title: Urbanization in Iran 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of urban population in total population, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2008.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018 to 2017.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2017 to 2016.
gold: This statistic shows the degree of urbanization in Iran from 2008 to 2018 . Urbanization means the share of urban population in the total population of a country . In 2018 , 74.9 percent of Iran 's total population lived in urban areas and cities .
